description:
Great game very fun if you play mutiplayer. I would say its the best 
worm game ever!
very fun can make rage but it is the best ubuntu game ever
Libre version of this amazing classic game.

This game is the best app in this store. Weapons are great, I recommend using the weapons Big Nuke, Super Shotgun, Laser, Crackler, and Flamer.
Very fun. What they dont tell you is that you can use a NINJA LINE by holding down alt-shift! i didn't discover this until I had had this game for a week.
i do not no which buttons to press at the start and i hate it any way.
it's an OP game. THE BEST APP IN THE WHOLE UBUNTU STORE!!!!
summary: it's an OP game. THE BEST APP IN THE WHOLE UBUNTU STORE!!!!

description:
The underground battles can get pretty crazy with missiles and lasers flying and cartridges pouring out of your worm's gun!! The computer AI kinda stinks but you battle other people on the same keyboard.
Like the other reveiw said you can shoot grappler hooks and hang and swing from them while firing.
Things about the game:                      

Missiles can be directed by walking while you shoot them. With some practice you can home in on your enemy.

lasers make a continuous beam through the dirt.

Hellraiders are the most powerful weopon in the game.

OH WAIT BIG THING
There is blood but that can be decreased to non existence. Remember it is pixelized though. This is why I did not rate 5 stars.

Fun game though.
summary: Who knew earthworms had rockets and grapplers!?

description:
Upgrade your worms to grow extra wings, mushrooms, and tornado projectorsz! Plus, INCREASE the blood up to %500!!! THAT IS THE BEST PART OF THE GAME, would suggest, uhh, but don't mind uhh, the uhh, uhh, 
uhh, uhh, thE uHH? OH! the I MEANT THE UHHZ..... But otherwise COOL!
un trucki: SI pulsan derecha y a la vez izquierda quitas trozos de tierra.

hola soy de 199090192314973 etnass eta tea atena sodj
no probe el juego porque tengo windowns
pense que se trataba de un gusano de among us

C'est un worms en temps réel. C'est trop chouette quand on maîtrise bien la corde, on peut tirer tout en pendouillant accroché au plafond, rallonger sa corde, se balancer, jetter un tas d'armes explosives sur la tête de son adversaire et remonter pour aller se cacher. C'est tout un coup de main à prendre! C'est super pixelisé mais la jouabilité est excelente et les armes super efficaces. De plus c'est chouette de voir le paysage se creuser à force de se tirer dessus.
summary: Un jeu super marrant à deux joueurs

description: je ne sais pas mais j'aimerais bien un nouveau ordinateur

C'est un super jeu à deux ou contre une IA. Si vous aimez les beaux graphiques et les belles explosions sur fond d'humour et avec plus de paramètres que "Liero", "Hedgewars" est une autre application qui vous attend pour faire chauffer le clavier.
Je n'ai pas compris comment commencer la game quand t'es dans le choix des armes...
